name: Embeddings OpenAI
natural_language_description: 这是 Embeddings OpenAI 节点。主要用于: Use Embeddings OpenAI

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to a vector store. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to a vector store. Insert one

model.name: model
model.description: The model which will generate the embeddings. Learn more.
model.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model | 作用: The model which will generate the embeddings. Learn more. | 默认值: text-embedding-3-small

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 作用: Additional options to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: dimensions (值: None) - The number of dimensions the resulting output embeddings should have. Only supported in text-embedding-3 and later models.
baseURL (值: None) - Override the default base URL for the API
batchSize (值: None) - Maximum number of documents to send in each request
stripNewLines (值: None) - Whether to strip new lines from the input text
timeout (值: None) - Maximum amount of time a request is allowed to take in seconds. Set to -1 for no timeout.
encodingFormat (值: None) - The format to return the embeddings in
